channel.title: How much longer am I banned for?
channel.description: I pm'ed the person who banned me like you said but I haven't gotten a response, it's been a few days since I've messaged him. And I've been banned for a few weeks i think lol

item.title: How much longer am I banned for?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Your ban became permanent when you ban evaded and griefed (multiple times), or at least a few months.

Tom, the banner, may lower it as his discretion, but that’s up to him.

Read full topic
item.source: How much longer am I banned for?
